resources.string: "Please try and reproduce the bug by following the same steps and then close the log. Example: 1. Which apps were open 2. What you did (which button did you press, etc.) 3. System force quit after 5 seconds"
Successfully submitted. Please turn off the log switch for %1$s.
Are yout sure to delete log?
No network connection detected. Please enable Wi-Fi or mobile data.

"You are turning off all offline logs. (1) Tap Cancel to return to the configuration page and keep capturing offline logs. (2) Tap Delete directly to delete all cached offline logs without archiving. (3) Tap Archive and delete to archive and delete all cached offline logs."
